signals.reason: Price is above EMA9 and EMA9 is above EMA21, indicating a short‑term uptrend. Recent candles show higher highs and a bullish engulfing at 20:28. RSI is likely in the 60‑70 range, MACD histogram is positive, and price sits near the upper Bollinger Band but still has room to run. Stochastic is turning down from overbought, supporting a brief continuation. All signals point to a bullish move with >75% confidence.
